rows.label: qev090304_MSG0001
rows.name: This... This is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0002
rows.name: It's the rest of him, but he's...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0003
rows.name: ...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_JNK0030
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev090304_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Yelv how sorry you are.

rows.label: qev090304_JNK0040
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev090304_SEL00241
rows.name: Tell Yelv that he has to accept this and move on.

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0004
rows.name:
Don't. I don't deserve that.
Not after runnin' from reality all this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0005
rows.name:
I know that! You think I don't know that?
But how the hell am I supposed to accept this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0006
rows.name: He...he's never comin' back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0007
rows.name: We were together from the start, but now it's just me. Alone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_JNK0010
rows.name: Counsel

rows.label: qev090304_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Yelv that he needs to learn
to stand on his own two feet.

rows.label: qev090304_JNK0020
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev090304_SEL0021
rows.name: Remind Yelv that he is not alone.

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0008
rows.name: I feel like that's what he's tellin' me, too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0009
rows.name:
Even if this was his very last battle,
he'd want me to go on livin'.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0010
rows.name:
The strongest soldiers can band together and stand alone,
he used to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0011
rows.name: It's almost like he was trainin' me for this day my entire life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0012
rows.name:
Guess it's time to man up and live up
to the legacy he left me, isn't it, pard...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0013
rows.name: Heh. Right. Sorry about that, pard. I know I got you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0014
rows.name: And I'm sure he's more relieved than anyone to know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0015
rows.name: He always did like to worry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0016
rows.name: And I'm sure I gave him plenty of cause, but that ends today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0017
rows.name: I've gotta be strong so he can stop worryin'â€”wherever he is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0018
rows.name: If he's really gone, the least I can do is lay his body to rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0019
rows.name:
C'mon, pard. There's work waitin' for us.
Can't stand around forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0020
rows.name: The debris we Reclaimers find are treasure troves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0021
rows.name:
I found mine, but the others back in New LA
are probably waitin' on theirs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0022
rows.name:
We ain't done till every single memento
of Earth is back in their hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0023
rows.name: Hell, it's what he'd be doin' if he were still here to do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090304_MSG0024
rows.name:
Whaddya say, pard? You and me, side by side,
till the last bit of wreckage is found![ST:wait ]
